effect_entries.effect: May be traded for a []{item:tm64} in the vertical Underground Path.
effect_entries.short_effect: HS: Traded for TM64. Gen II & Gen V: Acts as a Potion.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ジョウト地方　にある
チョウジタウン名物の　まんじゅう。
お土産品として　有名。

Mahogany Town’s famous candy.
When consumed, it restores
20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Caramella tipica di Mogania.
Souvenir dall’ottima reputazione.

Contiene los datos del Pokéathlon con el número
de victorias en conexión.

Eine Spezialität aus Mahagonia City. Sie wird gern
als Souvenir gekauft.

Un bonbon, spécialité d’Acajou.
Il constitue un cadeau très réputé.

황토마을의 명물인 호두과자.
선물로 아주 유명하다.

チョウジめいぶつの　まんじゅう。
おみやげひん　として　ゆうめい。

A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists
like to buy and take home. It restores
the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.

A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists
like to buy and take home. It restores
the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.

Un bonbon, spécialité d’Acajou.
Il constitue un cadeau très réputé.

A famous candy in Mahogany Town. Many
tourists like to buy them to take home.
